mapper.select: select count(T_AdminUserRoles.id) from T_AdminUserRoles left join T_Roles on T_AdminUserRoles.roleId=T_Roles.id left join T_RolePermissions on T_Roles.id=T_RolePermissions.roleId left join T_Permissions on T_RolePermissions.permissionId=T_Permissions.id where T_Roles.isDeleted=false and T_Permissions.isDeleted=false and T_AdminUserRoles.adminUserId=#{adminUserId} and T_Permissions.path=#{path}
